TC.Description: Verify that the quote panel is displayed for the created or selected Policy
Verify that the quote panel is displaying the correct values of the created policy
Verify the columns names in the Quote panel
Verify that the panel is sorted by Price with cheapest quote at the top
Verify that all the columns are sortable
Verify that stautus column is sorted with pending stautus at top
Verify that the event logs are created for quoted risks or policies
Verify that the monthly premium is displaying in Quote panel as per the frequency selected
